attributes.action: Scrap the tv licence fee make the Tories pay for their own propaganda
attributes.additional_details: After refusal to cover the Manchester Rally 29 Sept 2013 it is clear the BBC has failed in its duties as a  public service broadcaster and appears merely as a  propaganda tool for the Conservative party. The undersigned feel it should therefore be funded by its masters and not the public purse.

rejection.details: A matter to take up with the BBC.
